snippet: Maria Szyszkowska of Poland was expelled from the sport’s governing body after it found irregularities in judges’ examinations.
abstract: Maria Szskowska of Poland, top London Olympics official in rhythmic gymnastics, is expelled from the sport’s governing body after it finds irregularities in judges’ examinations.
lead_paragraph: Maria Szyszkowska of Poland was expelled from the sport’s governing body after it found irregularities in judges’ examinations.

headline.main: World Body Expels Top London Olympics Official in Rhythmic Gymnastics
